head.title: Hard Work
head.description: Laying his characteristically smooth, yet powerful, vocals over this disarmingly simple melody, Afarley expresses an optimism-charged outlook with a mild undercurrent of exhaustion, amidst the gentle fiddle of guitars and skittering drums, to provide a thought-provoking insight into the working man’s plight in one mellow and accessible track called, ‘Hardwork.’
